name: BusterandPunchSmart
0:
”Alexa, turn on the Buster bulb”
”Alexa, turn off the kitchen lights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can ask Alexa to control your Buster and Punch smart products. Connect Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:

Get set up with the B+P Smart App:
* Download our B+P Smart app from Apple App Store or Google Play and register an account.
* Set up your B+P Smart hub in in our app and configure your lights controllers and devices.

Set up Amazon Alexa:
* Download the Amazon Alexa app from Apple App Store, Google Play or Amazon App Store.
* Enable "Buster and Punch Smart" skill on Alexa app, and you'll be navigated to the "Buster and Punch Smart" skill login page.
* Follow the instructions on the page to sign in.

Here are some examples of things you can ask Alexa to do:
“Alexa, turn on the Buster bulb.”
“Alexa, turn off the kitchen lights.”
“Alexa, run scene dinner party.”
“Alexa, dim the bedroom light to 50%.”
"Alexa, set study light to cool white."
